message: I'm proposing an equal 50-50 split which is fair for both of us. This way we can resolve this quickly before inflation affects both our shares significantly.
Considering inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more

I notice your inflation rate is higher than mine, so time is pressuring you more. However, I'm still willing to be reasonable. This split gives you a substantial amount before inflation erodes our values further. Let's resolve this now to our mutual benefit.
I know my inflation rate is higher, but I'm not desperate yet. This is my most generous offer so far, let's settle

We're at round 6 of 12, and your inflation rate is significantly higher than mine. Your money is already worth 59% less while mine only 34% less. This trend will continue, making each round much costlier for you than for me. This is a fair offer considering our different positions - I suggest we conclude now before your share loses even more value.
